response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's truly a game-changer in its field and offers unparalleled value. Given its significance to you, I believe it's worth every penny of its $12,000 value. However, to make this opportunity more accessible, I am offering it to you for $11,000. This represents a significant savings for you while still allowing me to fairly compensate for the product's worth. I trust this pricing will facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 11000}
